startPage.effectSecription: Our simulators are based on the methods neuropsychologists, which have proven their effectiveness in the course of many experiments and scientific works.
startPage.reactDescription: to the reaction rate per week
startPage.focusDescription: to focus on tasks for 1 month
startPage.attentionDescription: attention to trifles and details in 2 months
startPage.synapse: You need to increase the number of synapses
startPage.synapseSubtitle: Synapse is a point of contact between two neurons
startPage.synapseDescriptionOne: The number of neurons and synapses, as well as their quality, determine the intellectual potential - the flexibility of the mind, memory, creativity, talent
startPage.synapseDescriptionTwo: is the process of creating, strengthening or restoring lost neural (synaptic) connections
startPage.synapseDescriptionThree: The process of creating new neurons in science is called neurogenesis
startPage.addingNewSynapse: Receiving new information, as well as special training, form new synapses
startPage.decision: It is up to you to decide how actively they will be created!

authPage.title: Log In
authPage.registerSugguestionText: and start training your brain right now.

registerPage.title: Registration
registerPage.loginSugguestionText: and continue training your brain right now.

gamesPage.title: Games by categories
gamesPage.concentrationDescription: The ability to stay focused on what is important and not be distracted by extraneous factors.
gamesPage.memoryDescription: Memorization of meaning and correlation of information elements. The ability to reproduce images in memory.
gamesPage.logicsDescription: The ability to think logically, analyze, and find consistent patterns.

lessOrMoreGame.description: This game helps to develop quick counting skills, improves the speed of analysis and quick decision making.
lessOrMoreGame.title: Less or More
lessOrMoreGame.firstSkillDescription: Making calculations in your head will be easier
lessOrMoreGame.secondSkillDescription: It will become easier to navigate texts
lessOrMoreGame.thirdSkillDescription: It will make it easier for you to finish what you started
lessOrMoreGame.rules: You must determine which number is greater and click on the button with the correct answer: «left», «right» or «equal». As you go through, arithmetic expressions will be shown to you. You need to compare them and indicate which one more.

rememberOrder.description: This simulator is aimed at the formation of memory function. During training, the amount of attention increases and the accuracy and speed of memorization improves; increases the duration of information storage and noise immunity. Such skills can be useful in consciously remembering something in everyday life in a time-limited environment. For example, driving theory, speech for public speaking, remembering the names of strangers during business acquaintances or the necessary information at conferences, etc.
rememberOrder.title: Remember the order
rememberOrder.memorySkillDescription: Eliminate the phrase 'I forgot' from your vocabulary
rememberOrder.shortMemorySkillDescription: You can quickly memorize any amount of information
rememberOrder.attentionSkillDescription: Stop making mistakes caused by distraction
rememberOrder.rules: Remember the numbers and click on them in ascending order

ColorMatchGame.description: The simulator helps to develop visual thinking and attention. These skills will be useful in sports, work and even in problematic situations, when it is important to keep calm. Training develops creativity, helping to create bright projects.
ColorMatchGame.title: Color match
ColorMatchGame.attentionSkillDescription: Stop making mistakes caused by distraction
ColorMatchGame.visualPerceptionSkillDescription: You can quickly find the main ideas in texts
ColorMatchGame.creativeThinkSkillDescription: Can come up with outlandish ideas
ColorMatchGame.rules: Does the name of the color on the left card match the color of the text on the right card?

header.title: Train your brain with pleasure
header.description: Develop memory, attention and thinking with our simulators
